Call Center Services Pricing

Our Call Center pricing is cost effective and we bring a crafted and inspired approach to every project we work on, which is why our clients love us and why they keep coming back.

[vc_single_image image=”550″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1488888256599{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1614875629025{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 100px !important;}” el_class=”bloom-rk”][vc_column el_class=”price-cus-box”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner]

$15.99 / Hour / Agent
  • Daily/Weekly/Monthly Reports
  • 24/7 Call Center Support
  • Training
  • QA Department
  • Managing Resources
  • Client Communication
  • Fully Equipped Call Center Environment
Hire Us Now
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” oi_ellements_style=”Without Paddings” bg_type=”image” parallax_style=”vcpb-default” bg_image_new=”id^3561|url^https://www.virtualinteract.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/03/App2-Background1.jpg|caption^null|alt^null|title^App2-Background1|description^null” bg_override=”full” el_class=”hire-us-bar”][vc_column width=”5/6″][vc_column_text]

Signup for ONE Months Paid Pilot

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″ el_class=”buton-respo”]Hire Us[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” full_height=”yes” css_animation=”none” css=”.vc_custom_1554644888042{background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”light_bg” el_id=”features”][vc_column]

Why Hire Us

Reduces Cost Of Support Department

[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1553879216150{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #f1f1f1 !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

HIRE US RIGHT NOW!

+1(777)123-45-67 / info@gravity.com

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”text-left” css=”.vc_custom_1492580649325{margin-top: 10px !important;}”]LET'S DO MAGIC

Stay In Touch

+1 (132) 123-456-7890 | hello@website.com

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes”][vc_column][vc_tta_accordion style=”modern” shape=”square” color=”green” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”What is Call Center support?” tab_id=”1622130000957-ac13eced-74e3″][vc_column_text]Call Center Support is a web-based service that allows communication in real-time over the internet. It allows businesses to chat with online visitors to their web page. Visitors are able to get answers to their queries or otherwise are referred to an expert for exact information.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How much does Call Center cost?” tab_id=”1622130130935-fecf3c82-0732″][vc_column_text]virtual interact is offering cost effective Call Center pricing. Cost for 24/7 English Chat is $14.99 / Hour.

    You will get 24/7 availability, real time communication, chat transcripts, reports and lead forwarding (Email) to name a few features that we offer for your website in that price.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What are the benefits of Call Center?” tab_id=”1622130173418-cf2f0725-52dc”][vc_column_text]Call Center is beneficial in so many ways:

    • It reduces cost.
    • It improves customer service.
    • Call Center increases sales and ROI
    • It earns customer loyalty.
    • Call Center support helps keep a record and review information later.

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How does a Call Center work?” tab_id=”1622130201330-18db29f6-2b60″][vc_column_text]Call Center enables instant communication with your website visitors via prompt messaging.

    Once you sign up with us, our in-house trainers go through your website content to understand what precisely you want to achieve via Call Center. We share script with you for final approval and then start training our resources. After deployment of Java Script to your website, online chat goes live.

    It’s pretty simple onwards. When a visitor comes to your website, they can initiate chat with a simple click on the Call Center icon. Our agents greet each visitor within few seconds and start a conversation. Our agents assist the visitor and gather any contact information you’ve asked us to gather. After the conversation ends, chat transcript is sent to your email(s) and lead is sent to your CRM.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Why is Call Center important?” tab_id=”1622130223132-dc83f837-7a1d”][vc_column_text]Customer service is an integral part of every business especially medium and large scale businesses. In today’s digital world, Call Center is important for websites because it is convenient for customers; they can connect with agent easily, their queries are answered instantly and they don’t have to wait for long. Agents are able to multi-task thus it is cost-effective and it saves time. Call Center provides a competitive advantage over other online websites that provide the same business as you do. Furthermore, Call Center increases sales and also build long term relationships. Satisfied customers hardly switch and also help grow your business by word of mouth.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Is Call Center a real person?” tab_id=”1622130242062-458e6fff-0e95″][vc_column_text]A large number of customers prefer to talk to human beings to get real time answers to their queries. virtual interact gives a human touch to every chat on your website. We provide round the clock Call Center service. This is to ensure that the visitors on your website do not get disappointed by robotic and off the wall response to their queries.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Does Call Center increase sales?” tab_id=”1622130264108-dc24d6b0-f7e1″][vc_column_text]To put it simply, yes it does. Call Center increase conversion rate. More conversion rate means more sales. This is because of the quick and personalized help. There is an increase in the number of consumers who prefer to use Call Center . People do not have to wait for a reply for long or do not want to get an automated response. A human response to their queries gives them a pleasant experience on the website. Visitors are likely to return to the same website that offers Call Center service, this deepens the relationship with the consumer. Repeat customers are also inclined to refer your services to other people which ultimately leads to the growth of business and increased sales.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

    Call Center Cost

    virtual interact’s Call Center Pricing plans are very cost effective as compared to many competitors. We offer 24/7 Call Center support and our Call Center includes multiple user friendly features.

    Pricing for onshore team is $26/hr with $700/agent One-time set-up cost.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
